Text:
function EP03_17()
    --.承-7【8月第2週】「笑っちゃおう」
    SaveData.Title = "笑っちゃおう"

    --//BG：メインストリート（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I took off my crossdressing at home and rushed to the academy―― ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ A shadow stood out prominently on the main street at night. ]])

    --//BU：エルメス（通常）

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0108.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ah! It's Mina-chan! Yoo-hooooo!<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//CG：エルメスハグ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV012ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0508.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Whaaat!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Once again, she hugged me just like before. ]])

    MSG([[ Wrapped in soft, fluffy feathers, feeling like my whole body was enveloped in softness, and the gentle, sweet scent reminiscent of fresh peaches made my head spin. ]])

    MSG([[ I have to stay focused or I might faint in an instant. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0509.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "S-So, what brings you here today? You wanted to talk to me?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0109.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Eh~? Jumping straight to the point? Since I just gave you a hug, why don't we do something fun like squeezing tighter or dancing together?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0510.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "T-That's impossible, impossible! I couldn't possibly do that, it's too intimidating!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0110.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "You're such a meanie~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    --//BG：メインストリート（夏・夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ca")
    --//BU：エルメス（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Saying that, Hermes reluctantly let go. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, her movements were incredibly swift. There was no opening from the moment she moved to when she hugged me, I couldn’t even twitch. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s probably just overthinking, but I suspect she might have learned some martial arts or something. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0111.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Since we're at it, let's go for a walk like last time<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">. I asked my mother and even got the security guards to take the night off<sprite="Emoji" name="note">." ]])

    MSG([[ Unaware of my thoughts, Hermes took my hand and we started walking down the main street. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    --//BG：校舎前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：1F廊下（夜）
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ca")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    --//BG：4F廊下（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0511.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Is it really okay to be going inside the school building...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0112.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "No problem, no problem<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">. After all, I’m the Princess Emperor<r=ひめおう>! The only ones who can scold me are the chairman or my mother<sprite="Emoji" name="note">." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0113.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "If I got serious, I could even make the cafeteria menu only pudding and bavarois! Ehehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">." ]])

    MSG([[ Saying something somewhat frightening like that, Hermes climbed the stairs beyond the fourth floor, heading to the rooftop. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --//BG：屋上（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The rooftop with the cool night breeze blowing. Naturally, I remembered the first time I met Hermes on the day of the entrance ceremony. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    --//CG：謎の少女との邂逅
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV002aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    --//effect：セピア加工

    MSG([[ ――Back then, Hermes was definitely crying._r I’d never asked before, but I couldn’t help but want to know the reason for those tears. ]])

FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    --//BG：屋上（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0512.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Um, Hermes-san. I’m sorry to ask this so late, but why did you cry when you saw me on the day of the entrance ceremony?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0513.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "And at that time, you seemed somehow..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：エルメス（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0114.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I don’t really understand myself, but whenever I come here, I always end up crying for some reason." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0514.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Hermes was shedding tears nonstop. Seeing an expression I’d never seen before, I felt startled. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0115.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I remembered something important. Before your sister, Marika-chan, disappeared, I had an important talk here." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0515.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh!? Wh-what kind of talk was it!? What did my sister...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0116.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The thing is, my memories around that time are kind of fuzzy, so I don’t remember the details." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0117.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "But I do remember there being some worries about the coed faction and the conservative faction. Since Marika-chan was apparently the leader of the conservatives, she must have been troubled by that." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0516.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "My sister Marika was the leader of the conservative faction...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I had never been told this before, but it didn’t surprise me. Considering Uran-san’s current position, it actually made perfect sense. ]])

    MSG([[ I heard that my sister Marika was the one who previously ordered the boys’ division to be suspended. ]])

    MSG([[ In other words, Marika was the conservative faction’s leader before, and Uran-san probably inherited that position. ]])

    MSG([[ That also explained why Uran-san had kept an eye on me since the first day. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s natural for the cousin of the former leader to be welcomed as an ally. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt sympathy for the mental strain Uran-san must be under, having to oppose me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0517.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Why are you telling me these facts now? What is your intention?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I questioned Hermes’ true motive. It seemed impossible to just happen to recall these memories so conveniently. ]])

    MSG([[ To me, it seemed like Hermes had some agenda underlying her sharing this information. ]])

    MSG([[ But Hermes answered with a carefree expression. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0118.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I just remembered and wanted to tell you before I forgot~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> I’m forgetful, so when something comes to mind, I act right away!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0518.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "…………" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0519.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Is that true? Aren’t you trying to deceive me?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I couldn’t believe it. I stared her down intently, trying to read her expression. ]])

    MSG([[ If she were lying or had guilty feelings, there would be some change in her expression. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0119.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Why the scary face? That’s not cute at all! Not at all, non-non-non<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0120.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "If you smile even when things are tough, you become super cute and happy-run-run!<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Let’s laugh and sing together<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Come on, 3-2-1~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">." ]])

    MSG([[ Saying that, Hermes started singing by herself. ]])

    MSG([[ Her face looked so genuinely happy, there was no hint of acting. Is this the face of someone lying? ]])

    MSG([[ I’ve always felt that Hermes doesn’t carry any malice. It’s as if negative feelings are completely absent, which gives a strange impression. ]])

    MSG([[ …No good. I absolutely cannot doubt this person. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0520.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I give up... I’ll believe what you say. Thank you for telling me about my sister." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0121.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Weii~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Now smile, smile<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Cute is justice! Let’s laugh off your worries together~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Dehehehe~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0521.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hahaha." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I laughed along, feeling a little better. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though we had only met a few times. There was a comforting familiarity, like I’d known her forever, and being with her felt pleasant. ]])

    MSG([[ Truly, she’s a strange person. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0122.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I don’t really understand, but Erika-chan and Mina-chan, being caught up in the battle between the coed faction and conservatives must be hard, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0123.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "But don’t forget to smile, okay? If you get tired, feel free to talk to me or Daria-chan. No way should you worry alone like Marika-chan!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0522.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...Thank you. I’ll be careful. By the way, can I ask you something?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0523.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hermes-san, which side are you on, the conservative faction or the coed faction?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I’d been curious about this for a long time. The identity of the so-called 'shadow coed faction' rumored among the academy. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m unrelated to the board of directors, so I’m excluded. Marika-nee and Uran-san are conservatives. Daria-san is a neutral leaning toward coed. ]])

    MSG([[ That left only Hermes-san as a possibility. ]])

    MSG([[ Honestly, I didn’t expect her to answer honestly, but I had to ask. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0124.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Me? I’m coed faction!" ]])

    MSG([[ She confirmed easily. I was stunned by the unexpectedly candid answer. ]])

    MSG([[ Does this mean Hermes is the 'shadow coed faction'? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0524.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "C-Could it be that you’re working under instructions from the board to promote the coed faction? Doing various things behind the scenes?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0125.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "What’s that? I don’t really get it!" ]])

    MSG([[ She denied it easily, and I felt relieved. Thinking about it carefully, it’s impossible for busy Hermes to be involved in conspiracies. ]])

    MSG([[ I found my question silly in hindsight and chuckled. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0525.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Why are you on the coed faction, Hermes-san? You’ve loved Yuriai Private Academy since long ago, right? Are you okay with changing its traditions?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0526.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "There are people who would be hurt by losing the traditions..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0126.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Hmm? But, but, don’t some people get hurt by keeping traditions too?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0527.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What do you mean by that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I didn’t understand what Hermes meant and asked again. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes answered with a smile. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0127.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Because, maybe there are kids who really wanted to go to a coed school, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0128.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Nobody ever truly knows which choice is right, for anyone, ever." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0129.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "It’s the same with live performances. Staff and I put a lot of thought into them, but we still get tons of cranky messages!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0130.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "That’s why I’ve decided: even if I end up hurting or being criticized by someone, in the end I will definitely make everyone smile!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0528.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "In the end... make everyone smile." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I mulled over Hermes’ meaningful words repeatedly inside myself. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes is a national idol. With her strong influence on people, the number of criticisms and people hurt because of her must be enormous. ]])

    MSG([[ In that situation, to say she’ll include even those she saddened and end up making everyone smile... ]])

    MSG([[ That seemed like a much harder, but much more wonderful choice than choosing to hurt no one. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0131.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I believe if coeducation happens, the academy will be filled with even more wonderful things and cute experiences!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0132.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "So for this election, I’m totally supporting Erika-chan and Mina-chan! I’m cheering for you, fight, fight!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0529.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...Thank you. I’m sure Erika will feel encouraged too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I felt laughable for having worried so much until just now. ]])

    MSG([[ Coeducation or preserving tradition. From the start, there was no absolutely correct choice. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter which is chosen, someone will get hurt. Then, my responsibility is to, like Hermes-san, make everyone smile in the end. ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to Hermes, it finally felt like the fog lingering in my mind had lifted. ]])

    --//SE：ヘリの音（小さめ）
PLAY_SE("SEg001.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0530.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I’ll search for a path that makes everyone at Yuriai Private Academy, including Uran-san, smile, so please watch me!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0133.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Yeah, yeah<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> I’m looking forward to it! It looks like my mother has come to pick me up, so I’ll be heading home soon<sprite="Emoji" name="note">." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0531.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Alright, take care." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(1000)

    MSG([[ Still, her mother is picking her up. ]])

    MSG([[ Thinking about it, a scene where a national idol is picked up by her mother might be very rare. ]])

    MSG([[ Even Hermes-san, in this regard, is no different from a regular family, which made me feel oddly familiar. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0532.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...H-Huh? Hermes-san, aren’t you going to leave the rooftop? Isn’t your ride here...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0134.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "It’s fine! It seems my mother’s tight on time with her next show’s location, so she’s coming here directly!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN02ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0533.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh!? W-What do you mean by that――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//SE：ヘリの音（大きめ）
PLAY_SE("SEg002.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ The helicopter sound I’d been hearing suddenly grew louder, and a rope descended from above. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    --//CI：ヘリコプター 060
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI060a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Looking up, there was a helicopter!? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0534.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Whaaaaaaaaaaaat!?!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ While I was stunned, Hermes skillfully secured a safety rope firmly to her belt, then pulled the rope twice with strength. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Well then, Mina-chan<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> See you later~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//effect：エルメスのバストアップが上に引き込まれていくような演出がしたい。

    --//SE：ヘリの音（小さめ）
PLAY_SE("SEg001.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Like a fish caught on a hook, she was pulled up, and the helicopter flew away into the distance. ]])

    MSG([[ No, it’s true that she was ‘picked up,’ but... ]])

    MSG([[ I was once again reminded how different the scale of life is between super-elite ladies like Hermes and myself. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_18")
end
